table.record: Subtitles
How can a Hongmen School student be here?
Hey!
Hey! Get out of bed, quick!
How can you still be sleeping? Look at what time it is! Get up! Quickly!
You little...! Jeez seriously!!
Get up get up! I know you can hear me! Come on come on!!
Yesterday
Clouds of change, approach...
Brother! Brother Musung!
Aah?
Student Musung! What are you doing? Everyone is waiting in class.
I was just about to go.
Ah! You rose so early today.
Everyone is always sleeping in so much, so I to got up first to wake them all up.
Ah..! What is that ...
Eh? What are you looking at?
It's there ...
What are you going on about? Nothing's there.
Don't tell me I made a mistake...
I clearly saw a woman in white clothes, floating in the sky.
Clearly, you still haven't woken up.
It was there a second ago!
Qinyi Jue..
Gil! Gilhong!
Worry about yourself, first.
I'm not gonna let you go!
Run... Save yourself ... quickly ...
What?
Hand over the Double-Edged Twilight Sword, Hongxuan!
Qinyi Jue .. I didn't expect you to still be alive ...
I think I wouldn't have died that easily.
Where are you two!
Musung... Musung.. don't tell me ... you...
Master, you make me quite disappointed. Is that all the leader of the Hongmen really got?
In order to get my hands on the secret book collection I've spent my mind, but it seems like I've wasted my effort.
I can't believe an evil creature like you was part of the Hongmen Society.
Ah, of course, I also helped out in poisoning the Master.
But this, I didn't expect.
Ha ha ha!! What was that? Some sort of Hongmen move?
Get away, it's dangerous.
Ah?
The Double-Edged Twilight Sword ..
At last, you've shown your genuine ability!
Ehhh!!
Even after this many years, you are nevertheless so large. But...
Don't think that I, Qinyi Jue, haven't changed over the years.
You?! Uooooh...
The last remaining student.
This life - for the Twilight Sword.
It's finally in my hands!
Let go of my student!
P .. please.. I beg you .. live....
Hongxuan, I kept my promise.
Master...
Hm .. maybe we should finish them off?
Nah. A Twilight wound is deadly.
Live. I have no one but you.
Qinyi Jue! Stop her!
Hey! Come to your senses! Hey!
Hey, are you feeling okay?
What? You decided to come with me? But this was your dream.
You could even not work, and live comfortably.
And that's it? I'm disappointed.
You said I'll become richer than an empress. Ha!
Don't tell me .. you listened to Xiao Syhai? It's because of you that I ended up with all these pirates, how could you?
I don't know. I'm staying.
Hey! Surou!
A week has passed already ...
In these prophecies, there's not a word of truth. Leave soon.
Did you really lose your faith? If the prophecies are true, then soon the Chosen One will appear.
Yeah, you've been talking about that for a week already.
But the prophecy said that in this month the thunder would strike ...
.. and a traveler with a twilight wound would appear.
Hallucinating again?
Listen! Wait a little bit! If you believe the prophecy ...
That's it! We've already waited a full week after the date of the prophecy's forthcoming.
You think your hero will suddenly fall from the sky?
What? .. *eh*
Really?...
Looks very fresh.
It's all true. I'm sure, that's them!
He was right.
Ha-ha! Truly.
Yes! Then we shouldn't waste time.
It worked?
No. Their body cannot handle any more.
The twilight wound is very deep.
Really? What is there to do?
For starters, we must send out the chosen one, and I will go to the Cliff of Prophecy.
This early?
We cannot wait any longer.
You want to see if our hero is gonna drown or if they'll learn to swim? Interesting.
I'm anticipating this so much.
Hmm, we'll see.
Now you can walk on the Dragon's Stream. So this is to whom the choice of destiny has fallen, eh?
Get to work! Understood?
Yes!
Ugh, I'm so hungry.
Ah? aaa .. you're good at guessing.
What are you doing? You can't act like this.
Ha-ha-ha, come on, admit it. I'm more handsome than my brother.
AAAAAAAAAH! Help!
What is it ....?
Ah! I'm begging you! This bastard wanted to hurt me ... *crying*
Over here!
Let's go together!
Damn it!
Xiaosi Hai! Thank you. You're in time, thank the gods.
Ha! Funny.
Old idiot. You think I would have gone with you?
Surou!
Where were you! I almost got dragged away by this pathetic old man.
Ha!
I've kept my word, my beautiful darling. Thanks to you, the whole village is under our command.
You think I would have left you?
Soon, with your help, I will be the captain of the entire pirate fleet.
Don't forget that you promised to make me no poorer than the Empress of the land.
Darling, it was very difficult for me because of him, couldn't you please kill him?
Ask for anything you wish. I will obey your every desire.
Damn it!
Don't you dare turn back!
Captain! Quickly!
I'm not going to forget you!
Thanks to the information that Surou has given us,
and the diversion operation, we managed to hold the Bamboo Forest.
Xiaosi Hai said that he shall soon siege the city.
I will join him.
Thanks to you, we defended the village. Thank you so much! We've gotten a hold of information regarding Qinyi Jue.
I've gotten in contact with Han Siran from the Great Desert. We're old friends.
A man in the Hongmen uniform had appeared in the great desert, and the locals in those places have spotted a mysterious lady more than once.
Here's who you're looking for. I would have liked to go with you, and get revenge...
But you can see that I clearly cannot leave this place.
For starters, find Qinyi Jue.
Go to the Outcast Village and Han Siran will help you.
Send word to me, when you find Qinyi Jue.
We are the last of the Hongmen. Take care of yourself.
Surou! Where are you! Surou .. Surou!!
I knew it, I knew that you'd live. The little rookie of the Hongmen School.
oh ... hey...!
But I need the girl.
You look very much like your mother.
You hope to win against me? Ha ha ha!
To battle!
My friend ... help me. I beg you...
I don't know anything.
You speak of Nan Surou ...
Yes, yeeees, look! Huhuhuu~
This is all thanks to my gunpowder.
What?
Leave! It's dangerous here!
Let's run! Quickly!
That's .. that's .. Hu.. Huley??
Let's go let's go!
Commander, quickly!
Heeeyyyy!! It's going to collapse!
It is you? The witch from the prophecy, the harbinger of my death?
Where is the God of War?
The God of War! I don't know. And even if I knew, I wouldn't tell you.
Fascinating. You're still alive?
Why are you looking for us? You really want revenge?
You're very brave. But this is all you're going to be able to do.
Goodbye.
This is a twilight wound?..
Qinyi Jue... Please...
Spare him...
We'll see what he can do ...
Oh? You've come to. You all right?
Good, your condition is stable. Han Siran wanted to see you. I've gotta go.
Maybe we'll meet again.
Calm down, both of you.
I've got both of you separate rooms with refreshments.
Let's go in.
Don't be noisy in my tavern.
Dan Yewol! Count your lucky stars!
No, you're the lucky one, Chensu Eur.
Uff, it's okay now.
What are you doing over there? Let's put everything away,
I don't get why Qinyi Jue decided to let you stay alive.
Heh, say hi to the Master for me.
What?
Patron, I think I've already told you...
Don't be noisy in my goddamn tavern!
*sigh*
Ah?
A compass?
Ohh, are you wounded?
This is just a scratch. Everything's fine.
Thank the gods.
That's it. If you make such a scuffle ever again, I'm throwing you out!
Ah, yes...
By the way!
Are you okay? Not hurt?
Is this little kid really ... The successor to the God of War?
Let me take a look. How are you? Break any bones?
huuu .. my heart is gonna leap out of my chest. What the hell happened?..
Hmm..
The one who controls the tides, shall go there on one's wings...
.. and fly to the place where the God of War sleeps.
But only the blood of the God of War can awaken these wings.
Ought to say goodbye ... eh, idiot.
The student is just like the teacher.
You're incredibly naive.
Qinyi Jue commanded me to find the successor to the God of War, and kill him, but I've changed the plan a bit.
Because only the successor can find the case of the God of War's secret writings.
That's why I decided to use this kid, to find them.
I wasn't able to get at any of the secret skills that the Master knew,
But oh well, I guess these will have to do. How about you?
Well, let's say goodbye.
Now I need the compass of the God of War, since I've already got his successor.
Wake up! You still need to do a certain thing...
This is the secret of the God of War!
You!
You and me .. we were students together ...
Please.. forgive me .. let me go...
Am I really .. a descendant of the God of War?
Ehn~
It's becoming incredibly dangerous here. Leave quickly!
Ohgod, quickly now! Run!!
Hey! What are you waiting for? Let's go!
Our mission here is complete. Take care.
What? You cannot do this to me!
Ehh, I don't know.
The young lady is a little willful.
You want this? Hey! Your taste is really good.
Where did our visitor disappear to?
You will recognize her instantly.
Sharp claws...
And she also has strange glasses on her head.
People who aren't close to her might think she's eccentric,
but to me, she is the most beautiful.
Oyy, what happenned?
Get back here! Return it to me!
I got robbed!
Get that thief! Get him!!
We've got a thief!
Do you have nothing to do except rob people?
Wait up!
Let's take a look ... good.
You came?
Yep, found it.
Hey!
Come to your senses! You can't keep going round in a circle.
Be above that.
Enough! You two-faced little shit. Lies, through and through.
Kill them all!!
Don't listen! Let go of your anger and hatred!
Do not become like Qinyi Jue!
It hurts ... it hurts....
Avenge me ....
Kill.. them all.
Fight! Don't hold back .... your vehemence.
Do not give in to the darkness. Remember what I taught you.
Hey!
Mmm.. you finally opened your eyes.
Qianzhen Quan is the god of war. One of the world's four guardians, sealing the Demon Emperor in the great Desert.
His war skills are godly.
In the whole world, there is no one who can stand against him.
But where is the Great Desert?
Lady! Lady Suling!
Ah?
Oy! Lady, are you all right? hey hey!
Thanks the gods! I'm so happy, I'm so happy!
You found the trunk of secret books belonging to the God of War?
Hey, where were you all this time?
Haha, of course. They say I am the successor of the God of War.
And also they gave me some kind of godly orb.
What? You're a descendant of the God of War?
Yeah! Isn't that pretty funny?
I know, right?
And what's up with your voice?
A-a-ah~
You have found it, at long last.
Qinyi Jue, right?
She probably is really depressed that things did not go as planned.
How about that other person?
It's exactly how I thought. Don't worry.
I didn't expect such kindness from Qinyi Jue
Because of some random twilight wound, sparing an enemy.
The twilight wound... a mark of the Chosen One.
Look after him. There's still hope. Everything is in his hands.
Adding another worry on top of everything!
Host!
Khhh... enough! Let's leave.
All right!
Is everything okay?
*heavy breathing* We've got to catch up to them quicker.
You haven't healed yet. You need to save your energy.
I'll take care of you. Don't do anything dumb!
I don't know who you are, but thank you. Come inside.
All right, quickly now.
Hey, you over there! The cultists have left! Don't worry, come out!
Don't leave anyone alive!
Get rid of the Yun army!
Stop them! Stop!
Commander!
Sohyun!
Han Siran has brought reinforcements!
Yes. Attack!
ah?
Are you ready?
Yes!
Who, us?
Sly little fuckers!
Happy-go-lucky bastards!
Li...
..ttle...
.. cunts!
Don't let them besmirch the fine name of our faction! Onwards!
ah?
There he is!
Lady Suling!
Mayoung!
Uff! They all want the same thing. Why are you standing like statues? To battle!
Suling!
Now is not the time to talk to family. We have to stop them!
This will take time. Go ask for help!
The way into the lair of the God of War has been opened! Kill all, who stand in our way!
Ah?
Who have we here? How very timely.
Mayoung!..
What are you doing? To battle!
Ah!
Please listen! Please listen to my explanation! It's not my fault!
You still have not abandone the human world of greed.
If you want to become this strong, I will fulfill your request.
Uff, I'm alive.
Suling!
No, I didn't plan to do anything like that...
Eternal Spirit Village, 16 years ago.
No, stop!
ooh, it's you.
What, you're friends?
Ah, he's regianing his senses.
How are you? Do you recognize me?
Done! I found the twisted dragon stream right away.
One sec, I'll open it.
Quick, let's jump!
What an encounter ...
ohhh, my head...
I don't deserve this kinda punishment...
Did we get where we're supposed to?
Where .. are we?
Where else!
This is the house of the elder, Eksan.
What? Eksan? You?
Yes. And who are you?
Why did yo break into me house?
Don't tell me ... a twilight wound?
What?..
Yes, drink, drink. Today is a good day.
Boss, I thank you from the depths of my heart!
You have a beautiful lady...
You also helped.
Hey, Ingwanil. Everyone's, celebrating. Why are you so down?
Hm...
I'm very happy that I met Suling, but I lost my younger brother.
My soul is being torn apart. How could we not have noticed them in the Bamboo Village?
Ah.. well, yeah....
But still!
You got suuuuuuuuuuuuuuch a girl, oh ho ho!!
Yeah!
Come on, drink, drink!
A? What? You're together with me once more. Are you not happy?
Ehh...
Aiyo....
Oh! Surouuu! Where are you goiiinggg ...
Okay.. Okay... We better have a drink.
Ah, yes yes yes!
I've only repaid my debt.
But I'm so sad. Ah, my life...
What will become of my face and body?
What to do...
Th.. th.. there..
Oooh, I just got Surou, and along comes this little present.
How very pretty.
Hey!
We're taking this lady with us.
If you don't talk and wiggle around, maybe you'll live.
You're so stubborn! How did you find out what I like?
Come with me.
Where?
To the palace.
Palace?
I will make you into an empress.
Ah? A what? Enough, get out of here!
*breathing hard* The rest you know... I was the only survivor...
And who's that?
What?
Over there...
Hey, who are you? This is our spot! Get out!
You don't want to be told nicely? All right, come here and I'll explain it to you not-so nice.
Leave him to me.... You just... Really like women.. I'll finish him with a single slice of my knife.
There he is!
Oh, you're not bad, for a pirate.
Hm...
Stinky little brat! How do you dare?!
We're surrounded?
You idiot! This is the leader of the alliance?
It can't be. The leader was supposed to come here...
Open your eyes, that's not her!
You're useless!
Definitely...
You're so slow.
Musing didn't expect anything out of you.
But I can't understand you you let the descendant of the God of War slip through your hands!
I beg you! Give me one more chance!
I know! You need to find Yiyun Shan? I'll fetch him for you!
Yeah right, you just want to trick us.
I'm not lying! But you must hold up your end of the bargain!
But how the hell are you going to catch Yiyun Shan himself?!
I'l give you a chance.
What, really?
We'll see if you bring Yiyun Shan or not. If not.....
Take the girl. Good work!
Y-Yes, sir!
F-Forward!
A little while earlier.
In your face, demons! You can't get the likes of me!
Thank you so much, Hongxuan.
Her, Feyu!
You're zoning out?
Well, yeah.
The darkness spreads without pause, and the demons wait for a chance to take over this world.
How much longer is this battle going to last?
Forgive me, for making you three take care of it, while I was away.
Well, anyways, thanks to you, we managed to seal off the demons.
We're happy that you've returned. Really-really!
I missed you very much.
Oy, oy, that's enough of that...
Ah? Tsk!
Hmm.. dammit.
The darkness has already spread over the entire body.
Maybe, kill him, before he becomes a demon?
Hey! Feyu! What are you doing? You're powerless here!
Y..you need.. a daughter?
Everything is behind us.
What is your name?
Jin.. Jin Shian..
Our time, a city of souls.
30 years ago, an ancient city.
Don't just stand there!
Those are demons! Quick!
Oh hey, you're not half-bad at finding your way.
Happy to see you!
Don't worry about the altar.
From that Dragon Stream, only my servants and the commander, can come.
Soon, the leader of the Servants of the Sky alliance, will be captured, and brought here.
Yes, yes wonderful. Now one doesn't have to worry about that.
Thank you ... do.. do you still remember your end of the bargain?
Huh? Oh yeah. I will send an official report to the emperor right away.
You will be the ruler of Luxury Valley, I promise.
He-heh, thank you.
Hm, wait a second, the commander wants to capture it.
Yes, only Yuran..
Hm, no. Who does those kinds of things?
I cannot reward a servent, in place of the one who accomplished it all.
Longjiao!
Yes!
Take the warriors and head in the direction of the altar.
Yes, sir!
Main force! To the altar! Now!
Yes, sir!
Commander, trouble!
But...
What? What else is it?
Th.. the rebels...
What?
*hushed exclamation of surprise*
Everyone! Attention! Get in formation! We must stop them!
Hey, wait, wait!
Here, quick!
We got it!
What is it?
Something went wrong.
Princess!
Jungha! You came!
Forward, to the base!
Let's go!
What are you...
Haven't seen you in a while, princess.
Ah .. you are now the head of the alliance.
Yuran! These are all the doing of Qinyi Jue!
Out of the way!
Yuran!
Doyou Han... what have you done?!
Shut up! Little liar. I know who you are.
Princess..
Wanru!
We wanted to live in peace, but you lured us out to the demise of the Empire.
It's unbelievable that our traitor was the daughter of the emperor.
You think, that we are your servants?
That is not so!
We don't want to die because of your family feuds!
No, that's not going to happen!
I waited for you, Yuran, please, save me...
Yes.. ah, you're hurt? It's okay, I'm here for you.
Now you will live .... forever.
What? Ah!
Where, where is my son?
Hey, careful...
Ah?
Yi.. Yixin...
Yi Yunshan, this is for my mother!
This is for all of us!
Well, what?
I'm holding my breath, I didn't expect this.
Children are so cruel..
This is a common occurrence in our rotting world.
Oh, you...!
Ha, goodbye, Yi Yunshan.
Help me!
Yi Yunshan is dead. Fulfill your promise.
Don't be anxious. The Yongling race is forever free now.
Check.
Thank you! Thank you!
It's forbidden to succumb to the darkness!
Princess, the games are over!
Now, head to the palace.
You think, everything will go your way?
Help me...
You're useless!
What a shame. No matter how many chances I gave you, you've come up with nothing...
It was all in vain. Guess you're not the chosen one.
Head on to the land of the dead and say hi to Hongxuan for me.
Elder!
Yixin .. don't go...
What?
Everyone in the village has turned demon... Because of Qinyi Jue...
That's impossible!
Are you mad?
I too, will soon turn into a demon.
Yixin, I need to tell you something.
Yi Yunshan, Yi Yunshan...
Your father...
What?
Find him... no matter what...
You must not desert him...
Chidren are so cruel. This is a common occurrence in our rotten world.
What have I done...
Where were you?
I was busy...
You want to find Qinyi Jue and get revenge?
We haven't even been introduced...
I am a Guardian, just like your teacher.
My name is Wushen.
Now you have left the Hongmen Way, and are on the Path of Demons.
And together with me, you will seek vengeance.
Revenge!
What?
Finally, the Hongmen School!
What, you don't recognize me?
Yes. It is me, Hwajung.
Surprised? Don't even speak of it.
Wasn't too easy, to get here.
To tell of my journey here, it would take a couple of sleepless nights!
Wha! It's so good to see you again.
Goodbye ... take care of yourself...
"A thousand years ago."
Is everything ready?
Hmm, then let's start?
Who wrote the pledge?
Obviously!..
Feiyue wrote it. Of us, he is the most generous and good.
We'll see.
What is this letter? Which way is up and which way is down?
The heaven and earth speak to us.
Us, the Guardians, are gatheres here, to drive out the devils from this world.
The heavens have sent light out to us, to bring peace to the world below.
But some idiots had called forth the darkness.
They have filled the world with dark energy.
Consigning all living things to eternal damnation.
The heavens have pitied us,
and sent the sun of Gon, to save all the world.
While the will of the skies exerts its light upon the world below,
bringing it back from the poison and permeating dark,
I will do all I can, to fulfill my mission,
to which I make my vow, before the Double-Edges Sword of Twilight.
If anyone every breaks this vow,
may the heavens themselves, take his life.
Captain, there's two of us.
We'll make short work of anyone at all.
We're sailing soon. Quickly.
Yes, sir!
He- heeelp!
You're such a coward.
The Brotherhood of the Sea doesn't need cowards!
I waited for you.
You carry part of me.
the God...
... of War!
Oh, how happy I am, to see you here.
Friends!
Allow us to introduce...
The replacement of the commander of the squad for hunting ancient mechanisms, number 3285...
Or simplyyy.... Beido.
But anyways,
You aren't that strong.
I don't even have to fight with you.
Meet the inhabitant of the labyrinth!
Come out!
Minotaaaauurrr!
Oho! Delicious!
Gimme!
Ah! So hot!
Who has given you permission! Ehhh.. impatient! Why couldn't you have just waited...
He-he, well sorry, couldn't control myself...
I wanna eat...
Yes. Now it's ready. Let's begin.
This year, you've joined us.
Yes! Can we start?
All right, begin...
The uprising was suppressed!
Quickly finish this one!
Come on, hurry.
So you want to become a patron?
There you are.
Damn it! The curse in your body is very strong.
You need help.
I have already decided on this. I cannot give up now. The only thing we can do is trust him!
Friend, please make it so our sacrifice is not for nothing...
Hmm.. we've regained consciousness.
My friend!
Present time. In the Yunlin Courtyard.
An assassin!!!
huh?
Daotian, what happenned?
Assassin!.. Assassin!
What!
Either way,
you were working for me.
This is all that you've managed to gather? Idiot!
Hey...
Dont give up hope.
Only afteer freeing up a field, can you fill it. This is all in order to fill one's live with trials.
Get to work, since you've got the secret manuscripts of the Hongmen Way.
Go, little one.
Surou!!!
You! Do you kno who I am?
It's obvious.
I am Surous - Daughter of the Empress and Emperor of the Country of Yun.
And I also happen to be the will of the Heavens.
The emperor, really..?
You still dont get it?
Qinyi Jue deceived us. The end is coming, to this world!
Hey-o!
Father King!
Your highness! Princess! Are you okay?
Qinyi Jue!!!
I have caught you, my beauty.
You..!
Brother, what's happenned to you?
I am Huley.
And now, the time of vengeance, has arrived.
You are useless.
Say hi to Feyu for me!
What are you doing! Let go of me!! Stupid pig! Let go of me immediately!
Let go! I said, let go of me!
This is dangerous!
Finally ... it is in my hands.
Now, no one can stop me! NO ONE!!
The only thing left is to plug up the Demon Emperor and kill him.
I am not planning to keep making sacrifices for people any longer.
I will get rid of the Demon Emperor and become the ruler of this world.
It will fall to me, to clean up this rotten world.
as for the Demon Emperor, someone once told me,
that a piece of him, resides in your body.
You should not control the Twilight Sword!
That's the demon, trying to break free of you.
I will have revenge!
My vengeance is done.
Now, it is your turn.
Is that your final answer..?
At last! My power has retuend to me. The only difference is the vessel.
Hey.
Hey, get out of bed, quick.
Thank you! I knew you could take care of this!
It's very uncomfortable for me to say this, but I have a request.
I want to give Qinyi a chance.
I talk of the possibility of returning to the past, before she had been infected by the demon of darkness, and start everything anew.
This is possible only with your power of the Hongmen Manuscripts.
Please be kindhearted...
Qinyi...
Thank you, friend. I will never forget your kindness!
You have fulfilled the will of the Hongmen Way.
Now I can leave this world, in peace.
Do not despair. The pain of parting can build character.
Promise me, that you will live happily.
I am proud of you.
Tell this world of the Hongmen Way ... I am depending on you!
You're crying again? Just like before... smile! Laugh!
Good luck to you... we shall depart first.
Goodbye! Be happy!
I have not seen such a chivalrous person in a long while...
They are worthy of being an oracle!
Gold, appear!
Time for lunch?
Silver, appear!
I'm busy, why are you annoying me?
For starters, complete this trial.
Silver, Appear!
... My poor brother ...
Idiot! He is so naive! How is he going to keep living, like this?
Why did you wake me up again..? Whyy?
Shut up! I will become king! That is what they call the vessel of the king!
A vessel? No, I cannot become this vessel...
come to your senses! This will be your last chance.
I will become a king!
I will take over this world!
Wow, the way he was beat! It's incredible!
No, no, I have not lost yet...
Oh my! I thought you were dead!
But you're still alive.
You shouldn't cry over spilt milk.
I must go now...
We'll see each other again.
He tricked me! A person!
I spent millions of gold to produce this masterpiece.
I have put together, the ancient technology from the South Kingdom of Heaven, to manufacture this device.
Preparation complete.
I proclaim myself, Hegemon of the whole world! All the martial arts circles are totally useless!
The events of the past have slit throats.
I'll down a glass of wine, to decide the fate of the land.
Knight...
Knight, you've come!
heheheh... long time, no see!
I've returned, from hell! *groan groan groan*
Julia, tell me what you need, and I shall do it.
Hehe, quite good~ Thanks for your troubles~
Now, if only you'd agree to my dark powers...
eh? Oh you speak of those..?
Mhm.
hmmm, hmm hmmm~~
Aiya, you got those kinds of abilities?
Really! No matter if its this one, or that one, I always end up disappointed.
Noble warrior, I am extremely grateful for having been given this new opportunity.
I know it will take all of eternity to return the favor for this kindness. But I have yet another thing to ask of you.
Noble warrior, I wish to ask you to watch over Xiyan.
I cannot explain the details to you right now, but only you can take care of him.
I hope you can stay by her side and teach her, as this kid has been given a rare opportunity to live again.
I urge you, noble warrior, to agree to my request. -Feyu
Grandpa~~ Grandpa Daotian~~
Oh, you've just come.
Come, come. Say hello. This is the warrior who will be taking care of you.
Hello, my name is Xiyan.
Qin Xiyan.
Listen up!
From now on, the Hongmen are our enemy. Remember that!
Thank you, noble warrior. Oh, no, no, master ~
Haha, that kid turned out to be from Chinyi Jue's time.
*hn!* Be careful to not let him provoke you.
Wait a sec!
Take us away!
Us too ~!
Noble warrior,
take me on as an apprentice!
Hey! Isn't this Jianfang's fault?
What are you doing? Do you know where this is? You're blindly rushing around!
I remember ~!! You mentioned that that annoying guy is the head of the band.
Today is the day you die.
This is really troublesome.
I didn't expect that I would personally set out ...
Look look, I love horses, but they are difficult to deal with.
Hey, looks like you've got some real skill.
In that case, how do we change the game?
So, pretty amazing, right?
Now comes the real fun!
You all!
This time, my subordinates will not show mercy!
What do I do ~!!!
This is so hard, let's give up!
No way! If we don't take that guy out, Miss Cannon Lan will be in danger!
If we go on like this, we're all gonna die!!!
Serves you right, you repulsive demon!
Miss Cannon Lan!
Miss Cannon Lan!
What audacity! Quickly, salute your senior demon!
haha, you're still alive?
Whether or not you believe it's changed, take another look. You don't recognize it?
I'll come back soon~ We're preparing slowly, ehhehehe~
You're okay, right?
Grandfather!
Grandpa!
hehe, my sweet little daughter, hahaha~
Grandpa...I was scared that something might have happened to you, grandpa. I was scared you might die... *boo hoo*
Ha ha ha, silly child. There isnt anything that can hurt me.
Really? Your body just recovers, right?
All right, I won't worry about it. Everything.. everything's gonna be okay~
this mundane feeling...I think you would also understand. Even the four guardians were unwilling to renounce the mortal world, for their cause.
Is this body of mine, engulfed by fire, destined to be my fate..? *cough cough*
Ah, danger!

If you are using Windows 7 / Vista 32bit OS it is recommended to activate the option to expand the memory for a better gaming experience.To activate / deactivate the function,use the Enable3GBMem_Vista_Win7_32bit.bat / Disable3GBMem_Vista_Win7_32bit.bat in the installation folder of the game. (For memory expansion, it is necessary to have more than 3GB of memory (RAM), the function is applied after restarting the computer.To enable the feature, you must have administrator privileges on your computer. So, when using the file to enable / disable the function, make sure to run it with administrator privileges.)
